TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MaskInputRejectedEventHandler(object sender, MaskInputRejectedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed MaskInputRejectedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MaskInputRejectedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As MaskInputRejectedEventArgs)
public delegate void MaskInputRejectedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, MaskInputRejectedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件類別輸入的字元不符合輸入遮罩中相對應的元素時引發。The event of the class is raised whenever an input character does not match its corresponding element in the input mask. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 事件。For more information, see the event. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
